references.name: Eric Marshall

references.reference: chris was initially highly recommended to me by someone i trust. from initial contact, Lavi has been a pleasure to work with. he is an extremely competent ui architect and brings with best ideas to technical people. i have had the pleasure of working with him on my final project at dev bootcamp where we spent 100 + hours over 7 days building a fully functional web app. Lavi quickly learned new concepts, and i was impressed at how he go out of his way to level up his cohort mates in the technologies we were learning. no matter how tense the situation, Lavi always maintained a positive outlook and a light spirit. he be a great asset to the organization he is an awesome table tennis player. he will make a positive addition to any team very. we will work together again in the future and wholeheartedly recommend him for any front end or full stack project., references provided upon request, owner. com, can be reached at: keith at com, can be reached at: keith at com, can be reached at: keith at com, can be reached at: keith at com, jason@.,@. com, at, otc chief técnica).@ latinia. com, newshore servicios globales.. sucursal, general director.@. com, newshore servicios globales.. sucursal, general director., Lavi has a great ability to pick up new skills quickly and with regards automation to take on new projects. his work is always available to lend a hand to a large and big picture database leveraging
